pullrequest.title: re enable round buttons if the simulation launch failed

content.raw:
Hm, wait.  If the user clicks >1 (or Stop and then >1) , then the simulator_ready value should automatically back to Pending (status: 0) . And if it fails again (status: -1) then I believe the notification would be open again.   Wouldn't it ? 
 
I'm inclined to leave it as it , assuming the simulator_ready value would cycle over all the statuses once more.
content.html:
Hm, wait. If the user clicks >1 (or Stop and then >1) , then the simulator_ready value should automatically back to Pending (status: 0) . And if it fails again (status: -1) then I believe the notification would be open again. Wouldn't it ?

I'm inclined to leave it as it , assuming the simulator_ready value would cycle over all the statuses once more.
